resources.string: Why this app requests external storage permissions

Granting storage read/write permissions lets you search for files on the external storage. The write permission is needed to create the file cache database which enables fast file searches. If you do not grant this permission the app will not find files but will still find Apps and Settings.
No History Available\nTry Doing A Search

By using the & character you can include more than one search term, where all search terms must match.

For example, by searching for documents&pdf only items that contain both documents and pdf (anywhere in the name) are matched.

Similarly, use ! to match only items that does not contain the search term.
